about_the_game:
See what it’s like to be a sorcerer!

Story Mode: You have managed to enter the evil sorcerer’s castle through the dungeons. There are evil souls that live in the castle which gives the evil sorcerers their power. It is your mission to locate and destroy them. Use your magical wand and shield to fight against the dark sorcerers who are patrolling and guarding the castle.

Destroy the sorcerers and fight the evil boss head on with a choice of two magical wands (with over 35 different spells). There are multiple features which change the difficulty level of the mission which include: the option to generate a shield, magic draining, health regeneration as well as easy, medium or hard difficulty modes.

Survival Mode: Test your magical skills and survive for as long as possible against many dark sorcerers.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
